text: Odd is an Egg is a 2016 animated, short film directed by Kristin Ulseth and written by Maria Avramova and Kristen Ulseth. The Film is based on a book of the same name by Lisa Aisato. ==Awards== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year ! Presenter/Festival ! Award/Category ! title: Odd is an Egg
